extracted_information: The web content provides detailed pricing and performance information for GPT-4o, including its multi-modal capabilities, speed, cost efficiency compared to previous models, and benchmark evaluation results against other prominent models.

specifications.model_architecture: 端到端 (end-to-end) 单一神经网络 (single neural network) 处理文本、视觉和音频
specifications.api_rate_limits: 比 GPT-4 Turbo 高 5 倍 (5x higher)

pricing.api_cost_comparison: 比 GPT-4 Turbo 便宜 50% (half the price)

availability.chatgpt_plus_users: 可用，消息限制高 5 倍 (Available, with up to 5x higher message limits)
availability.chatgpt_voice_mode: 将在未来几周内在 ChatGPT Plus 中以 Alpha 版推出 (Will roll out in alpha within ChatGPT Plus in the coming weeks)
availability.developers_api: 作为文本和视觉模型立即访问 (Immediately accessible as a text and vision model)
availability.api_audio_video_capabilities: 将在未来几周内向一小部分受信任的合作伙伴推出 (Will launch support for GPT-4o's new audio and video capabilities to a small group of trusted partners in the coming weeks)

features: 接受文本、音频、图像、视频的任意组合作为输入
生成文本、音频、图像的任意组合作为输出
实时音频响应速度接近人类对话反应时间
在英语文本和代码方面匹配 GPT-4 Turbo 性能
显著改善非英语语言的文本处理能力
在视觉和音频理解方面表现更佳
通过单一模型端到端处理所有模态，改进了信息保持和理解
